argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` R ) = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` ( 1st ` R ) ) = ( GId ` ( 1st ` R ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_isprrngo | |- ( R e. PrRing <-> ( R e. RingOps /\ { ( GId ` ( 1st ` R ) ) } e. ( PrIdl ` R ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simplbi | |- ( R e. PrRing -> R e. RingOps ) |
